summary: Completed testing of 4 reported user issues. Backend APIs for group picture update working correctly (100% success). Frontend issues identified: feedback banner overlapping navbar, login buttons missing alignment classes. ConfirmDialog component and join/leave handlers not found in current page source, indicating potential implementation gaps.

ui_bugs.issue: Banner positioned at top=0px overlapping with navbar (height=80px). Should be positioned below navbar.
Missing h-10, inline-flex, and justify-center classes for proper vertical alignment
Missing h-10, inline-flex, and justify-center classes for proper text alignment

integration_issues.issue: ConfirmDialog component and handleJoinGroup/handleLeaveGroup functions not found in page source

design_issues.issue: Fixed banner container missing top-14 md:top-20 positioning classes, currently has top-0

passed_tests: Backend API: PUT /api/chat/groups/{id} - updates group icon only successfully
Backend API: PUT /api/chat/groups/{id} - updates group icon with name/description successfully
Backend API: PUT /api/chat/groups/{id} - accepts icon data without validation
Backend API: PUT /api/chat/groups/{id} - preserves icon when not included in update (iconChanged=false simulation)
Backend API: POST /api/chat/groups/{id}/join - joins group successfully
Backend API: POST /api/chat/groups/{id}/leave - leaves group successfully
Backend API: GET /api/chat/groups - retrieves groups successfully
Frontend: Chat page shows correct unauthenticated state
Frontend: Chat page has login button for unauthenticated users
Frontend: Confirmation-related keywords found in page source (dialog, modal)
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Fix feedback banner positioning: Update banner container to use 'top-14 md:top-20' instead of 'top-0' classes. 2. Add missing alignment classes to login buttons: Add 'h-10 inline-flex justify-center' classes to both navbar login button and login form submit button. 3. Verify ConfirmDialog implementation: Ensure ConfirmDialog component and handleJoinGroup/handleLeaveGroup functions are properly implemented and included in the chat page bundle. 4. Test group picture update in EditGroupModal UI to ensure iconChanged state works correctly with backend API.

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All group picture update and join/leave APIs working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 60% - Chat functionality working, but banner positioning and button alignment issues remain
